data_table.description: Subject ID, consent group, and affection status of participants with or without hepatocellular carcinoma and involved in the "CAGE Profiling of ncRNAs in Hepatocellular Carcinoma Reveals a Strong Activation of Retroviral LTR Promoters in Virus-Induced Tumors" project.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Case control status of the subject
variable.value: Case and Control derived from single patient
